title: We’ll celebrate the journalists who weave communities together
description: Our industry tends to center on a single archetype of journalistic heroism. We lionize the reporter who exposes corruption, topples the powerful, and publishes the story against all odds. That work remains essential. But there’s another kind of heroism that we rarely spotlight: the local journalist who shows up day after day to report on...
